short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension for chrome based browsers to add more enhancements to AAU site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Extension to add more controls to the campus.aau.at site. 

Features

- skip time forward backwards in bbb videos (youtube controls)
- automatically redirect to the semester you like on courses page and exam page (setting for it in extension window)
 change volume of live bbb sessions (volume setting is saved and automatically restored for new sessions)
